name: Waldron Jacket Blue
name_cn: 沃尔顿 夹克 蓝色
description:
Carrying Capacity: 1K µSCU
The Waldron suit exudes sophistication by fusing classic style with contemporary flourishes. OpalSky redefines success with this geometric patterned jacket, featuring a pinstriped false-shirt and tie layered underneath, plus a unique split-seam back.
description_cn:
储物空间：1K µSCU
沃尔顿西装通过融合经典风格和现代风格而散发出成熟老练的感觉。欧珀空服装这款几何图案的夹克重新定义了成功，其特色是细条纹假衬衫和下面的分层领带，再加上独特的拼缝式后背。

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-新巴贝奇(New Babbage)-Aparelli_NewBabbage
